EmailTemplate.name: 12 hours have passed since WO on 8.2 On Shelf to ship to client
EmailTemplate.subject: Work Order {!Order.OrderNumber} - 12 hours passed since WO was changed to "On Shelf to Ship to Client"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Operations Team,
{!Order.OrderNumber} for {!Order.WOAccountLink__c} has been in "8.2 On Shelf to Ship to Client" for 12 hours. Locate the order, verify that it is ready to ship and coordinate shipment immediately.
{!Order.WONameLink__c}
Thanks,
Ralph the Rooster
